text.div:
NUBC Priority (Type) of Admission or Visit Value Set

These codes are found in the CMS 1450 form.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http//www.nubc.org/priority-type-of-admission-or-visit

name: NUBCPriorityTypeOfAdmissionOrVisit
title: NUBC Priority (Type) of Admission or Visit Value Set
description: These codes are found in the [CMS 1450](https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms-Items/CMS1196256) form.
